long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Functor Network Chrome extension turns your browser into a powerful light node, enabling secure, automated on-chain actions across multiple EVM chains. It brings Functor Networkâ€™s decentralized keystore rollup right into your browser, letting you contribute to network security while simplifying key management for AI-driven automation and on-chain applications.
